description:
11.25 chromakey
YUV colorspace color/chroma keying.

The filter accepts the following options:

blend.description: Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels either fully transparent, or not transparent at all. Higher values result in semi-transparent pixels, with a higher transparency the more similar the pixels color is to the key color.

color.description: The color which will be replaced with transparency.

similarity.description: Similarity percentage with the key color. 0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.

yuv.description: Signals that the color passed is already in YUV instead of RGB. Literal colors like 'green' or 'red' don't make sense with this enabled anymore. This can be used to pass exact YUV values as hexadecimal numbers.

name: chromakey

parameters.description: The color which will be replaced with transparency.
parameters.name: color

parameters.description:
Similarity percentage with the key color.

0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.
parameters.name: similarity

parameters.description:
Blend percentage.

0.0 makes pixels either fully transparent, or not transparent at all.

Higher values result in semi-transparent pixels, with a higher transparency the more similar the pixels color is to the key color.
parameters.name: blend

parameters.description:
Signals that the color passed is already in YUV instead of RGB.

Literal colors like "green" or "red" don’t make sense with this enabled anymore. This can be used to pass exact YUV values as hexadecimal numbers.
parameters.name: yuv

source:
11.25 chromakey

YUV colorspace color/chroma keying.

The filter accepts the following options:

color

The color which will be replaced with transparency.

similarity

Similarity percentage with the key color.

0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.

blend

Blend percentage.

0.0 makes pixels either fully transparent, or not transparent at all.

Higher values result in semi-transparent pixels, with a higher transparency the more similar the pixels color is to the key color.

yuv

Signals that the color passed is already in YUV instead of RGB.

Literal colors like "green" or "red" don’t make sense with this enabled anymore. This can be used to pass exact YUV values as hexadecimal numbers.
